After killing Jean Grey ( Famke Janssen ) to save mankind by it can not control the powers of the Phoenix , Logan ( Hugh Jackman ) decided to abandon the life of every hero and went to live in the jungle as a hermit . Depressed , he is found in a bar by the young Yukio ( Rila Fukushima ) . She was sent at the behest of his adoptive father , Yashida ( Hal Yamanouchi ) , which was saved by Logan in Nagasaki , Japan , at the time when the atomic bomb was detonated . Yashima rediscover Logan want to make you a proposal : transfer your healing factor to it, so that Logan can at last become mortal and lead a life as any person . He declines the invitation , but ends up infected by Viper ( Svetlana Khodchenkova ) , one mutant specializing in biology that is also immune to poisons of all kinds. Frail , Logan must find ways to protect Mariko ( Tao Okamoto ) , the granddaughter of Yashida , which is the target of both his father , Shingen ( Hiroyuki Sanada ) as the Yakuza , the Japanese mafia .
